    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ActionType
    Represents the specific actions a player can take during their turn.
    Card
    Represents a single playing card.
    CardView
    Visual representation of a single playing card in JavaFX.
    Deck
    Manages a standard deck of 52 cards.
    DefaultPotManager
    Standard implementation of a Pot Manager for handling chips, main pots, and side pots.
    FiveCardDraw
    Concrete implementation of Five Card Draw.
    GameContext
    Represents the current mutable state of the game table.
    GameEngine
    The central controller of the poker game.
    GamePhaseConfig
    Defines the configuration for a specific phase of the game (e.g., "The Flop").
    GuiGameObserver
    Bridges Game Engine events to the JavaFX UI thread.
    GuiPlayerInput
    Implementation of IPlayerInput that delegates to the JavaFX Controller.
    HandHistory
    Stores the complete log of a specific hand for archival or replay.
    HandRank
    Represents the final strength of a poker hand (e.g., Full House, Pair).
    HandRank.RankType
    Enumerates the standard poker hand categories by power.
    IBettingStructure
    Defines the rules for betting limits (e.g., No-Limit, Fixed-Limit).
    IGameMode
    Defines the ruleset for a specific poker variant.
    IGameObserver
    Observer interface for the Poker Game Engine.
    IGameStateService
    Service interface for persisting game state and player data.
    IHandEvaluator
    Interface for evaluating the strength of a poker hand.
    IPlayerInput
    Interface for abstracting how we get input from players (Console, GUI, Network).
    IPotManager
    Interface for managing the collection and distribution of chips.
    Main
    Main entry point for the application.
    NoLimitStructure
    Implementation of a No-Limit betting structure.
    Omaha
    Concrete implementation of the Omaha poker variant.
    Player
    Represents a participant in the game.
    PlayerAction
    A record of a specific action taken by a player at a specific time.
    PokerApplication
    Main JavaFX Application class.
    PokerTableController
    Main Controller for the Poker Game UI.
    Rank
    Represents the rank of a playing card.
    SidePot
    Represents a specific pot that only certain players are eligible to win.
    StandardHandEvaluator
    Standard implementation of poker hand evaluation logic.
    Suit
    Represents the four standard suits in a deck of cards.
    TableManager
    Manages the seating arrangement and dealer button position.
    TexasHoldemMode
    Concrete implementation of No-Limit Texas Hold'em.
